So let's review
the reasons why you

should consider using software
to adjust your exposure
setting.

First, you can easily see
your exposure settings.

Second, you can immediately
see if your settings are right.

Third, you can adjust
your composition
in Real Time and Live View.

And, that view is the aperture
you've set, showing you what is
and what is not in focus.

And fourth, you can
store the image directly

onto your computer without
worrying about storage
room on a camera card.

But again, if you choose
not to use a software,

all your exposure settings
